website_summaries.verdict: Generous dimensions and a soft, floppy feel make this jumbo-size Mickey Mouse plush toy perfect for cuddling.
pros: Large size easily allows it to double as a decorative toy in-between play
Fine attention to details pleases even the most discerning Mickey Mouse fans
Comes with Disney's stamp of authenticity
cons: Some owners expected it to be a little bit larger
Might be too big for toddlers to carry

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Mickey that was received was not the one advertised. Authentic Mickey that is advertised is on the right (I purchased it tonight after receiving the Mickey that was ordered yesterday). Mickey that was received is on the left. I was extremely disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Tintes

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Yes this did all that I wanted it to do. My grandson who is 18 mos old opened up his gift and seen that it was a very big Mickey he just started what I call happy feet, like running in place, buy happy feet looks and sound just what he looks like happy. Yes and Yes, I would do this over and over to see him so happy. Good job Mickey.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: This is a FAKE one! The fur of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a FAKE one! The fur of the doll are very hard,I bought both mickey and minnie I can tell they are fake when I received them, they looked different from the dolls in the Disney stores but they are about the same prices.I just bought them from the Disney store. Don't buy these, if you already bought them please go to the nearest Disney store then you will find out what am I talk about.
customer_reviews.author: SUN

customer_reviews.title: It is safe for all ages to play with.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product. It is soft and kids can carry it all around and take it everywhere they want to go. I bought it for a friends 5yr old daughter and she really likes it. she loves Mickey Mouse this is good for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

customer_reviews.title: Big soft Mickey!
customer_reviews.text: Great for Mickey lovers! Ms 4 adores cuddling this guy and it feels like good quality in terms of materials.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandson tore it! He is only 1, seemed poor quality to me
customer_reviews.author: Sue Paolucci

customer_reviews.title: Disney Mickey Mouse plush toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandson when his baby brother was born so he wouldn't feel so left out. Loved it. Very durable nice material.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTY A. McCORMICK

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: This animal was nowhere near 25"! MAYBE 11" if that. I'm pretty bummed I paid close to $50 for something worth $10 at most. I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: While the plush is cute the picture is very deceiving. The item is way smaller than the one pictured . I’m disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Dashe Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect!!! We got him to match a minnie we had and they look great together
customer_reviews.author: Terry bird

customer_reviews.title: One of my nephew's favorite birthday toys!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves his 'ickey' stuffed animal! My sister said he's been sleeping with it every night. It's so cute to see him carrying this huge Mickey around!
customer_reviews.author: Holly SatterlundTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is obsessed with Mickey and loved this gift. I just wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah

customer_reviews.title: Just my size MM!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So cute. My nephew loves Mickey Mouse and it's basically the same size as him. Perfect Christmas gift. He's going to love it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mickey Plush for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today, and was pleasantly surprised. Some of the older reviews stated that item was cheaply made and not an authentic Disney store product, but mine was in beautiful condition and arrived with the seal on the foot. I was also quite pleased with size of plush. I would definitely recommend and would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair!
customer_reviews.text: I already had the Minnie, so got Mickey to match. Nice pair!! My order came quickly, so I was happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Thing.
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews. No Disney tag. Quality not the same. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron  C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Our granddaughter was so excited with Mickey. She immediately gave him a hug & kiss!
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that i received the just play version instead of the authentic Disney store as described
customer_reviews.author: D. Rethman

customer_reviews.title: Good for play or decor.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a toddler. She was afraid of it at first (lol) so it was more decoration than toy but it has since become a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: T. Zajch

customer_reviews.title: Not as promised
customer_reviews.text: Description said it had Disney Authentic Certificate on foot, like those at Disney store. There was no certificate, and the plush toy was noticeably inferior in quality to those at the Disney store that I saw before oredering this one. I am returning this product and buying the one at the Disneystore for $7.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M. Giveans

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson loved his Mickey
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved his Mickey, he just turned two in June and we surprised him by sending this to him!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A..  Eads

customer_reviews.title: Not a very big Mickey
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but it's not as big as you think.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Landen

customer_reviews.title: everything a child wants in a plush toy
customer_reviews.text: This Mickey Mouse is the right size, the right shape, and has the perfect feel for a young child. My granddaughter opened the box on Christmas and the look on her face was one of total delight. She pulled Mickey out and put her little arm around his neck and carried him around for the rest of the day. He seems to be well-made and of course he's always smiling and happy.
customer_reviews.author: kevan

customer_reviews.title: Size is very misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Cute Mickey but the size appears to be way larger than it actually is in the photos. I'd save some money and find it at another store.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Abegglen

customer_reviews.title: so what better gift than a nearly life-size Mickey stuffie
customer_reviews.text: My oldest grandson is a huge Mickey fan, so what better gift than a nearly life-size Mickey stuffie!! : )
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L Valperga

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. My grandson sleeps with Mickey every night.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Really not the size of the picture. It’s half the size. Not happy of this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Giant Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.text: The Grandson really loved the Large Mickey Mouse. He carries it around all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hamillton

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well & super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great size! My 2 year old loves Mickey and it is almost as big as he is when he is holding Mickey. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what’s shown. My son is so happy with it and that’s all that matters!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Abrego

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Looks great in my sons mickey themed bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this to my grandson and he loves it. He even sleeps with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, It has survived a four year old for about 6 months now and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: The size were not big like they said on here ripped off
customer_reviews.text: The size of the bear said bigger then they sent me the bear was very small they ripped me off
customer_reviews.author: Mery

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Mickey. He is 6 years old and sleeps with it every night. The Mickey comes up to about his chest level if standing it on the ground. From the top of the ear to the bottom of the foot is about 27" tall. My son said it feels like he is sleeping with someone (which helps him feel safe because the Mickey is the size of a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fain

customer_reviews.title: Great Mickey Mouse Doll - Fun for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple - it is as described. Girls love him. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Sabunabu

customer_reviews.text: Wrong size If you see it on the picture its a lot bigger than In real
customer_reviews.author: Steen Høj Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old has Mickey by his side 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kokinchak

customer_reviews.title: he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Mickey for my nephew for last Christmas , he loved it !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wetwoody

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: When this item arrived I was delighted with it. The quality was superb. It seemed smaller than what I had originally expected but it was reasonably priced and a Disney original. I did return it as the person I bought it for, already had the exact one. The return was extremely easy...I did pay return shipping because there was nothing wrong with this item except it wasn't needed by the person I purchased it for. Amazon is truly great on shipping and even returns if needed.
customer_reviews.author: the beav

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A Big Mickey that's fun to play with. Like a real kid. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his mickey, I seen a lady ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his mickey, I seen a lady had posted that it was a fake mickey, well this mickey came from the Disney store, it came with tags that said Disney Store, hardly fake!!
customer_reviews.author: Desarae

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: Not authentic ..no embroidered patch on left foot as described...face of mickey is white compared to beige coloring of doll as shown in pictures. Very dissatsified. Returned item
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: The description says 25" and the receipt mailed with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The description says 25" and the receipt mailed with the mickey said 25" however the mickey I received is only 18" and there's no seal on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: catherine petry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my grandson, 15 months old, was wide eyed and will not let Mickey go!!!
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE FIOL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than my 8 month old grandson! He LOVES this guy !!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Carachuelo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It didn't not come when it was supposed to. Not the same item in the picture. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KWAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year loves his Mickey Mouse plush. It's big and soft and, well, Mickey. And he loves Mickey!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Padulo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Not as big as the picture makes it look. But good sized
customer_reviews.author: Clayton O.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this Mickey for my daughter. It's the size of my little one and she loves it! Nice and soft, but doesn't shed
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Great Mickey
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as large as I expected, but my granddaughter will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Love the Mickey
customer_reviews.text: Love the Mickey! It arrived 4 days early and packaged with care. Can't wait to see my nephew's reaction when he see his birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Beadles

customer_reviews.title: This was a great Muckey and my 1 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Muckey and my 1 year old loves it. A perfect size and very cuddly for the 1 year old. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great dealer
customer_reviews.text: My boy loved his new mickey mouse toy. Very good dealer, would happily deal with this supplier for any other needs
customer_reviews.author: joe smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really not as big as it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son Absolutely loves this Mickey. He tries to take him everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Still a favorite
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter over a year ago. She still sleeps with it in her bed every night, unless her little brother steals it away to his bed. I guess I should have gotten two.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 3 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: If you could have seen his little face light up when my grandson saw Mickey under our Christmas tree. Mickey was so soft; just the perfect height, and a lift to any day. Mickey actually arrived a day earlier that expected which was also great. Usually, the expectation, is that if you get it on time, you are doing ok. Especially with all of the weather issues the US has had to deal with. Imagine my surprise. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia martinez

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I rated the Mickey Mouse doll a 1 star, to stop consumer who wants to purchase a "Authentic Disney Store" doll without the patch. I purchased the doll twice from this supplier and both dolls were missing the patch advertised on the web-site. No I would not recommend purchasing the Mickey Mouse doll as advertised
customer_reviews.author: stepfanie w

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I cuddle with this Mickey every night as I sleep, it is just the right size. I love it so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Hongfa Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my great nephew for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great gift for my great nephew for Christmas. He's two and there are no buttons for him to put in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Meet my grandson expectations! He sleep all time with Mickey. I will recommend it to my friends. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Gradinarov

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: They said fast shipping it took weeks to arrive. Otherwise very nice genuine Disney product.
customer_reviews.author: AC

product_meta.title: Disney Mickey Mouse Plush Toy 25"
product_meta.description: Magic in the details... Left foot has ''Genuine Original Authentic Disney Store'' patch Match to our Large Minnie Mouse Plush Toy, sold separately The bare necessities Polyester/plastic beads/foam 25'' H Imported
